articles.title: Elio movie review & film summary (2025) - Roger Ebert
articles.summary: Schmaltzy yet sincere, “Elio,” the latest from Pixar, is as predictable as they come but as tender as they can get. The animated spectacle possesses many of the ingredients familiar to the studio’s best works—family, understanding, loneliness, and loss—but throws in some additional flair during its climax that ultimately lands this interstellar adventure.
